original: LJUNGBLOM, Per Åke Gudmar, Ingenjör, Göteborg, f Mjölby 31/5 00 av Idsfisk KEL o Gudrun Sandberg, gm Anna-Stina Beronius. Maskiningex Polytechn Inst Strelitz. Anst American Tel & Tel Co :s konstr.byrå New York 26—32, repr o kontroll v Malte Månson AB Linkp 35—41, repr fma Specialmaskiner AB Gbg sed. 41. Deläg fastigh Mjölby. Resor : Tyskl 19—23, USA 26—32. Hobby: Teckn.
translated: LJUNGBLOM, Per Åke Gudmar, Engineer, Gothenburg, born in Mjölby on May 31, 1900, to parents Idsfisk KEL and Gudrun Sandberg. Married to Anna-Stina Beronius. Holds a degree in mechanical engineering from the Polytechnic Institute in Strelitz. Worked at the construction bureau of American Tel & Tel Co in New York from 1926 to 1932, then as a representative and controller at Malte Månson AB in Linköping from 1935 to 1941. Currently a representative for Specialmaskiner AB in Gothenburg. Partial owner of property in Mjölby. Traveled to Germany from 1919 to 1923 and to the USA from 1926 to 1932. Hobby: Drawing.
